text:
Nelnet Lincoln, NE Onsite/Full-time

IT Software Engineer: Responsible for developing enterprise wide cross-functional software solutions, working closely with IT Software Architects and IT Business Analysts. Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science. Minimum 3 years experience in software development.

To see more about this position & to apply, please go to: https://careers-nelnet.icims.com/jobs/3378/nbs-it-software-e...
